item.title: Deploy Gokit Todo to Gae With Cloud Build From Github Repo
item.author: Author
item.description: gokit-todo, gokit-todo-frontend are applications developed with low dependencies on code suites and simple tasks on Kubernetes. We can easily migrate to Google App Engine for CI/CD development process using Google Cloud Build and Github repo.
